== Elampalloor (CT) (628442) ==

Elampalloor (CT) is a town in the [[Kollam]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 13.99 sq. km. and harbouring 8552 households with total population of 33959 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 75 km. Male population is 16198 and female population is 17761. Scheduled Caste population is 5851 and Scheduled Tribes population is 68. Census Location Code of the town is 628442<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 75 km. Railway station is at Kundara at a distance of 4 km.
